fields.headline: Lifeventure washbag
fields.bodyText: I'm looking for a simple washbag that's a practical size and easy to clean. This one's neat, compact and light, made from tough 900-denier nylon. It has a hanger built in so it can be hung from branches etc. The main compartment has three mesh pockets and is protected with foam padding. The outer compartment has one external and two internal pockets, as well as two mesh dividers. Colour, size and price? It's comes in three sizes: small (1 litre) £11.95, medium (2.5 litre) £15.95, large (4 litre) £17.95. Where do I get it? Most travel and outdoor specialists stock them, including Ellis Brigham 0161-834 5555, Snow+Rock 0845 1001000 and Trek & Field 01268 494444, which all have mail-order services.
